contentfulProduct.title: iPad Booth
contentfulProduct.introduction: Photobooth shaped like an iphone, digital display

description.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Introducing our incredible Photo Booth, your one-stop solution to infuse your events, weddings, and parties with fun, everlasting memories, and cherished friendships. Elevate your celebrations and create a lively atmosphere that will leave your guests with unforgettable moments to treasure.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Our Photo Booth is not just a rental service; it's a gateway to an immersive experience that brings people together. Step inside and embark on a whimsical journey of laughter and joy. With its sleek design and easy-to-use interface, our Photo Booth seamlessly blends into any event, providing a focal point that sparks excitement and encourages interaction among guests.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Capturing memories has never been more enjoyable! Our state-of-the-art booth comes equipped with high-resolution cameras, professional-grade lighting, and a range of fun props to unleash your creativity. Strike a pose, wear a silly hat, or grab a quirky prop â€” the possibilities for hilarious and heartwarming snapshots are endless.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"At the heart of our Photo Booth lies the power of friendship. Bring your loved ones closer as they gather, creating unforgettable memories that will be cherished for years to come. Watch as bonds strengthen and laughter fills the air. Our Photo Booth becomes a hub of connection, a place where memories are shared, and friendships are celebrated.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Not only does our Photo Booth capture candid moments, but it also offers a myriad of customization options. Choose from an array of personalized backdrops, props, and themed templates to match your event's style and create a truly unique experience. Whether you're hosting an elegant wedding reception or a vibrant birthday bash, our Photo Booth adapts to your vision, transforming it into a reality.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Sharing memories has never been easier. Our Photo Booth allows guests to instantly print their photos, preserving the magic of the moment in a tangible keepsake. But it doesn't stop there. With integrated social media sharing capabilities, your guests can instantly upload their images to their favorite platforms, spreading the joy far and wide and immortalizing the memories online.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Let us take care of the logistics. Our professional team will handle the setup, operation, and breakdown of the Photo Booth, ensuring a stress-free experience for you and your guests. We're dedicated to providing exceptional customer service and guaranteeing that every aspect of your rental experience is seamless and enjoyable.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Planning your next event, wedding, or party? Look no further than our Photo Booth, the ultimate companion for fun-filled memories and lasting friendships. Book now and let the magic of our Photo Booth bring your celebrations to life. Get ready to capture moments, create connections, and make memories that will be cherished forever.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

faqs.question: How much does the iPad booth cost to rent?

answer.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The digital photo booth is $700 for 2 hours and each additional hour is $100. Delivery is included within 100km of Belleville or Toronto, otherwise an additional charge will apply.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

faqs.question: Does the iPad booth print physical copies?

answer.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Yes, the iPad photo booth provides both physical and digital copies.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

faqs.question: How many people can the iPad booth fit?

answer.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"While this camera does not have a physical booth and can accommodate as many people you can fit in front of the device, it is recommended no more than 8-10 for the best quality.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
